comments: Helpful for keeping track of food and symptoms but definitely not an app for a newbie. New to having to keep an eye on FODMAPS so wish it was easier to see which was what. There is the ability to pay for highlighting of this but I didn't find the highlights were on each food item. As well, the food options assume you're making things from scratch. Or some searches food items just didn't result in anything and I had to manually add each ingredient. Definitely not gonna be doing that takes forever

I've used several apps to track my IBS-C. I know the developer is still working on this app, but so far I like it. They have a great selection of food items and recipes already in the database. You can easily adjust the recipes, too. After every entry it asks you to rate your triggers (bloating, constipation, etc) which I LOVE! I'm so bad about tracking those. There is no export option yet, which I hope comes soon. Using the free version and there are no ads, either.

Found this app really disappointing. The high/low fodmap scoring is behind a paywall. Additionally I lost confidence in the food directory, hardly any of the meals I get from the supermarket are in the directory.
User experience is just really cluttered. I looked for my regular low fodmap items in the meal directory and could not find any of them. Going to keep looking for a helpful fodmap food diary
I use it for my IBS and how bloated I am etc good reminder.

title: Estre√±imiento üÜò remedios caseros
description:
¬øQu√© es el estre√±imiento?

El estre√±imiento significa una complicaci√≥n a un nivel diferente dependiendo de la persona. Para muchas personas, esto simplemente significa evacuaciones intestinales poco frecuentes (heces). Para otros, sin embargo, esto significa heces duras, dificultad para evacuarlas (esfuerzo) o una sensaci√≥n de evacuaci√≥n incompleta despu√©s de una evacuaci√≥n intestinal. La causa de cada uno de estos s√≠ntomas de estre√±imiento var√≠a, por lo que el enfoque de cada persona debe adaptarse a cada paciente espec√≠fico.

El estre√±imiento tambi√©n puede alternar con diarrea. Este patr√≥n a menudo ocurre en el s√≠ndrome del intestino irritable (SII). Al final del espectro, hablamos de impactaci√≥n fecal, que es cuando las heces se endurecen en el recto e impiden el paso (aunque a veces la diarrea puede ocurrir incluso con obstrucci√≥n debido a una fuga de l√≠quido c√≥lico alrededor de las heces afectadas).

El n√∫mero de evacuaciones intestinales generalmente disminuye con la edad. La mayor√≠a de los adultos tienen lo que se considera normal, entre tres y 21 veces por semana. El patr√≥n m√°s com√∫n es un movimiento de arco por d√≠a, pero este patr√≥n se observa en menos de la mitad de los individuos. Adem√°s, la mayor√≠a son irregulares y no tienen deposiciones todos los d√≠as o el mismo n√∫mero todos los d√≠as.

Desde un punto de vista m√©dico, el estre√±imiento se define generalmente como menos de tres evacuaciones intestinales por semana. El estre√±imiento severo se define como menos de una comisi√≥n por semana. No hay raz√≥n m√©dica para tener una silla de montar todos los d√≠as. No tener uno durante dos o tres d√≠as no causa malestar f√≠sico, s√≥lo angustia mental (en algunas personas). Contrariamente a la creencia popular, no hay evidencia de que las ‚Äútoxinas‚Äù se acumulen cuando el movimiento es infrecuente o el estre√±imiento conduce al c√°ncer. Pero entonces, ¬øqu√© hacer en caso de estre√±imiento?

Es importante distinguir entre estre√±imiento agudo (de aparici√≥n reciente) y estre√±imiento cr√≥nico (de larga duraci√≥n).

El estre√±imiento agudo requiere una evaluaci√≥n urgente porque una afecci√≥n m√©dica grave puede ser la causa subyacente (por ejemplo, tumores de colon). Tambi√©n requiere evaluaci√≥n inmediata si est√° acompa√±ada de s√≠ntomas como sangrado rectal, dolor y calambres abdominales, n√°useas y v√≥mitos, y p√©rdida involuntaria de peso.
La evaluaci√≥n del estre√±imiento cr√≥nico puede no ser urgente, especialmente si las medidas simples proporcionan alivio.

¬øCu√°ndo hablamos de estre√±imiento cr√≥nico?
El estre√±imiento cr√≥nico es una defecaci√≥n poco frecuente o una evacuaci√≥n intestinal dif√≠cil que dura varias semanas o m√°s.

El estre√±imiento generalmente se describe como tener menos de tres evacuaciones intestinales por semana.

Aunque el estre√±imiento ocasional es muy com√∫n, algunas personas sufren de estre√±imiento cr√≥nico que puede afectar su capacidad para realizar sus tareas diarias. El estre√±imiento cr√≥nico tambi√©n puede causar esfuerzos excesivos para tener evacuaciones intestinales y otros signos y s√≠ntomas.

El tratamiento y las curas para el estre√±imiento cr√≥nico dependen en parte de la causa subyacente. Sin embargo, en algunos casos, una causa nunca se encuentra‚Ä¶ pero siempre es posible hacer algo para tratar los s√≠ntomas!

El estre√±imiento cr√≥nico es una defecaci√≥n poco frecuente o una evacuaci√≥n intestinal dif√≠cil que dura varias semanas o m√°s.

title: Fiber Database
description:
Do you have constipation problem? 
Some common diseases like hemorrhoid and anal fissure are often caused by constipation.
Having high-fiber diet is the most effective way to avoid constipation.
This application contains the dietary fiber information of over 6000 foods.
You could search the foods by their name and also have a quick calculation of their fiber content.
This complete set of data is retrieved from the US Department of Agriculture.
Data is stored locally and no internet connection is required.

title: FODMAP Helper - Diet Companion
description:
FODMAP Helper - Diet Companion
This app makes identification of high and low FODMAP foods easier to help you with your FODMAP friendly diet. This can be helpful in reducing symptoms for people with IBS, Irritable Bowel Syndrome, Crohn's disease, Colitis, Lactose Intolerance and various other food intolerances, food sensitivities, and stomach problems.

Features include:
- Comprehensive list of foods and whether or not they are low FODMAP foods, to make finding foods that won't exacerbate your IBS easier.
- Search by food name and category.
- General FODMAP Diet and Irritable Bowel Syndrome, IBS, Crohn's disease, Colitis, and - 
- Lactose Intolerence and other food sensitivities info.
- Additional details on the specific breakdowns of each food and whether it is high, medium, or low in the main categories of Polyols, Oligos, Fructose, and Lactose.


Premium Features Include:
My Experience - Log your personal experience with foods to determine if a food works for you regardless of its FODMAP content. Rate whether you had a good or bad reaction to a food after eating it, then leave detailed notes so that you know for next time how said food will affect you.

Community Experience - See how the community has reacted to a food via anonymized My Experience ratings. This will let you know if the majority of users of the app had a good or bad reaction to a food.

My Experience and Community Experience data analysis - Advanced graphs and data analysis present the my experience and community experience data to you in a useful and intuitive format to show you breakdowns of good and bad reactions to the various food categories as well as what your worst foods are.

Challenge - The FODMAP Diet is an elimination diet for IBS, GI diseases, and food sensitivities. Once you've eliminated all high FODMAP foods from your diet, you can challenge foods to determine if they work for you. This lets you introduce these foods back into your regular meals one at a time and track your experience with each food after three days to determine if it will work in your FODMAP friendly diet. More details on challenges are contained within the app.

About FODMAPs and IBS
FODMAPs are short chain carbohydrates that are poorly absorbed in the small intestine, especially for people with Irritable Bowel Syndrome, IBS, Crohn's disease, Colitis, Lactose Intolerance, Gluten Intolerance, other food intolerances and stomach sensitivities. They include short chain oligo-saccharide polymers of fructose and galactooligosaccharides, disaccharides (lactose), monosaccharides (fructose), and sugar alcohols (polyols).

The term is an acronym, derived from:

*Fermentable
*Oligo-
*Di-
*Mono-saccharides
*And
*Polyols 

Although these specific carbs are naturally present in the foods we eat, diet restriction has been found to improve symptom control in people with irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) and other functional gastrointestinal disorders (FGID), such as Lactose Intolerance, Gluten Intolerance, Crohn's disease, Colitis, and other stomach sensitivities. Prior to the formation of the FODMAP concept, diet was seldom used as first line therapy for management of IBS, Crohn's, Colitis, Lactose intolerance and other FGID.

Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) is a group of symptoms‚Äîincluding abdominal pain and changes in bowel movement patterns without evidence of underlying damage. The main symptoms of IBS are abdominal pain, discomfort in association with frequent diarrhea or constipation and a change in bowel habits.


DISCLAIMER:
We do not perform any testing ourselves. All compiled data should be used as guidelines not as basis of fact. Consult your physician before beginning any new diet. This general information is not intended to diagnose any medical condition or to replace the advice of your healthcare professional.

title: Irritable Bowel Syndrome Home Remedies
description:
Home Remedies For Irritable Bowel Syndrome | At times, it can be challenging to get your irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) under control. You may find it helpful to learn about some Home Remedies.. 

Eat more fiber. Fiber is a bit of a mixed bag for IBS sufferers. It helps ease some symptoms, including constipation, but can actually worsen other symptoms like cramping and gas. Still, high-fiber foods such as fruits, vegetables, and beans are recommended as an IBS treatment if taken gradually over several weeks.

title: Idle Poo Factory VIP
description:
VIP Benefit
+50 Poo coins

The controversial Masterpiece certified by the World Poo Association!
Even just looking at it cures constipation!

#Prologue
In a future not so far from now, humanity's craving for fine art has gone bananas...

To the point where artificial human excrement made from faux human digestive tract started being sold as art.
Indeed, the Great Age of Poo has begun.

And here you are, challenging this artwork market with your masterpiece, Poopy Man Mark I.
Towards the Greatest Pooper of the World!

#CHARACTERISTICS
1. Unique Graphics - Crafted from hand-made pixel art.
2. The Peak of all Idle Games - Taste the very summit of an idle game.
3. Variety of Ingredients - Has all the fun of unlocking around 100 different ingredients.
4. PooNet - Cumulative poo weight is sent to the PooNet, and you can see the World Ranking.
5. Certificate - Certificates are issued from the World Poo Association.

#How To Play
1. The ingredients are automatically fed.
2. Poo is produced through the mouth, toothed wheel, and aging container. (Touch to speed up the process.)
3. Produced poo is sold according to the current price. (You can increase the price in the Price tab.)
4. You can withdraw the revenue from the bank to unlock heavier ingredients or upgrade each part.
5. Produce a lot of poo to become the Top Ranker in PooNet.

# Precautions before deleting the game
Please note that when the game is deleted from the device, saved data is also deleted. Please utilize the cloud save load feature in the setup menu when changing your device.
Payment details can be restored for non-consumptive products (add removal etc) but not for consumptive products (coins). Please use the " Restore" function in the settings menu.

# Why does it ask for access to a photo album?
It is to ask for permission to save the capture screen. It is not used for any other purpose.

#Info
Part of the revenue is donated to Toilet Construction Project in underdeveloped countries via International Toilet Society (http://www.withwta.org).

‚ñ∂Privacy Policy‚óÄ
https://merovingiaan.github.io/ipf/privacy-policy.html

comments: Absurd and amazing, so fun and cool looking, definitely recommend this to anyone who likes idle clicker games. My only question is what is the spell setting for?

This is stupid & is Clickbait, trying to appeal to shockedness or dark scense of humour but it isn't humourous; it's stupid & underlines basic principals of human decentcy which is that some things are private & not pretty in our physical lives. We can have things remain out of public eye, not cuz it's shameful or secretive it's just decent to not put in veiw. There's a lot of gross things we will ultimately see in our Iives, we don't have to add things that aren't nessesary to the list.

I just find it funny, I also see it as commentary on the art industry, with what is considered art anymore. I do wish there was a bit more instructions than "tap here". If anything a menu to open that explains how each part works.
Nice game to pass your time with, but as I see, the game doesn't save on my phone; everytime I relaunch the game, I am sent back to square one! Please look into this matter as soon as possible, devs!

Too many ads, too much to remove them and make it enjoyable. The carrot isn't worth the pain, the app theme is a boring time waster knocked up in unity and uses the same beaten to death cash-grab themes of "coins" to do anything. groan

title: Home Remedies For Colon Cleansing
description:
Home Remedies For Colon Cleansing is a great way to lose weight and to get you on a path to better health. An unhealthy colon can lead to all sorts of problems you don't want. Some possible problems are colon cancer, constipation, feeling sluggish and weight gain. When you clean the colon you are actually removing harmful toxins and impurities from the body.

A healthy colon and body cleanse is needed because a dirty colon can be the result of you eating processed foods, eating foods that are not healthy or having unhealthy eating habits. When your colon cannot eliminate the toxins effectively, it becomes overburdened and toxins accumulate. Be sure to check the labels on the packaged food items that you consume and make sure that the ingredients are all natural and that no preservatives are used on the products.

Many people are looking for a good home remedy for colon cleansing. Whatever home remedy you use to clean colon out you want to aim for going to the bathroom two times a day. You also want to make sure there is no straining or pain when you go. Drinking plenty of water is a key to clean the colon. You want to make sure you get 8 to 10 glasses of water a day. Getting enough daily water will help you to keep you digestive system healthier by flushing those toxins out through sweat and urine and will also keep your body hydrated.

Another great home remedy for colon cleansing is getting fiber in your diet. Fiber can help with digestion and help ensure regular bowel movements, which leads to a clean colon. One of the most fiber-filled foods is whole grains. There are many foods that can contain whole grains. These include whole wheat bread, oatmeal, brown rice and whole grain cereals. You can also eat peanuts, rice cakes, sunflower seeds or beans. These foods all contain fiber and are also healthy.

A healthy colon and body cleanse is necessary to keep your body in top shape and free from toxins. There are various colon cleansing procedures which are being used by doctors. But many people would like to clean colon out naturally by using various home remedies for colon cleansing. You can use these home remedies for colon cleansing to cleanse your colon and eliminate the toxins from your body within the comforts of your home.

One of the best ways to clean the colon out is to use a colon cleansing supplement that you can use in the privacy of your own home. These supplements work to thoroughly cleanse the body of all toxins by gently flushing them out through the colon. Most people will experience noticeable results such as increased energy, natural weight-loss and enhanced metabolism within a few weeks of beginning detoxification.

Just a few of the benefits of using a supplement as a home remedy for colon cleansing are:

1. You can do it in the privacy in your own home.
2. Less expensive than going to your doctors office.
3. No embarrassment.
4. Not having to talk to someone about your bodily functions.

Download the app to know more..

title: POOP Wearable
description:
Poop can be tricky.

Sometimes we need to try hard to get the right shape of poop.

Constipation or diarrhea can ruin our days.

With POOP's test you can find out your situation and practical, easy-to-apply remedies in order get better shape of poop.

Select your pooping situation and let POOP help you to poop better and proper.

Home remedies, easy solutions can save your day!

POOP also gives you access to information without being connected to the internet.














POOP does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on the POOP mobile application.

title: Home Remedies & Natural Tips - Organic Treatment
description:
Organic Treatment App is the best, when you need quick cure,home remedies and natural remedies for common health issues.

Think of it as having instant access to a e-book of natural home remedies of cough, home remedies of pain and cures right on your mobile, available anytime and anywhere. 

A toothache,headache,illness,fever, insomnia, acne as well as nausea are just some of the illnesses that can be treated with natural cures without the overuse of medicines.

Natural home remedies treat wide range of minor illnesses. A simple ginger, garlic or honey could treat several types of minor illnesses. 

Natural home remedies can treat abdomen pain, acidity, heartburn, pimples, acne scars, age spots, arthritis, athletes foot, backache, bad breath, baldness, fat belly, bites & stings, bleeding gums and more.
Natural home remedies for cold can treat you without side effect of expensive medicine 

This App includes home remedies for cough, home remedies for sore throat,constipation,cough remedies,cold,heartburn,dandruff,dry cough remedy,for diarrhea,for flu,pimples, pimples,acidity,
stomach ulcer,canker sore remedy,nausea,high blood pressure,cough and cold,sunburn,gas,burns,gout,sinus infection,strep throat,stomach pain,scabies,boils,heartburn relief,heartburn
ringworm,fatty liver,itchy skin,high blood pressure,thrush,acid,dry cough at night.


This app is a your go to Complete guide to Home Remedies and Natural Cures for Common Ailments/illness.

Features 

‚òÖ Remedies: a list of plants, fruits and essential oils with explanations about uses and benefits.
‚òÖ Problems and diseases: list of the most common illnesses (allergy, poor digestion, acne, joint pain, nausea, anxiety and much more) with the related natural remedies.
‚òÖ Healthy Food: Foods that are beneficial for different parts of the body.
‚òÖ Beauty Hacks: The natural Beauty hacks that will make you look beautiful.
‚òÖ Last news from the science world: the most recent scientific studies about the lifestyle, nutrition, and health are reported.
‚òÖ Weight Loss Tips: Some natural exercises or foods that may help you lose some weight.
‚òÖ BMI Calculator: Allows you to monitor BMI and percentage of fat in your body.
‚òÖ Waist to Hip: Ratio of the circumference of the waist to that of the hips and is a useful indicator of overall health and the risk of developing serious health conditions.
‚òÖ Calorie Calculator: Allows to work out exactly how many calories you need to consume per day.
‚òÖ Body Fat Calculator: Helps you calculate your current Body Fat percentage.

 Organic Treatment App addresses the common cures as following:

1. Home Remedies Stomach Diseases: Natural treatment for diarrhea, bed wetting (enuresis), constipation, gastritis, indigestion.

2. Home Remedies for Hair Diseases: Natural treatment for hair loss (baldness), dandruff.

3. Home Remedies for Skin Diseases: Natural treatment for pigmentation on skin, allergies, bruise, chickenpox, measles, prickly heat, body odor, skin abscess, acne, blisters, boils, burns, corns and calluses, dry skin, dermatitis (eczema), hives, psoriasis, ringworm/dermatophytosis (fungal skin condition), warts.

4. Home Remedies for Respiratory Diseases: Natural treatment for asthma, sore throat (throat pain), bad breath or halitosis, tonsillitis, common cold, cough, athletes foot, bronchitis, influenza (flu), hoarseness (laryngitis).

5. Home Remedies for Circulatory Diseases: Natural treatment for heartburn, high blood pressure (hypertension), leukemia, acid reflux, anemia, chest pain, high cholesterol, low blood pressure.

8. Home Remedies for Bone/Joint Diseases: Natural treatment for back pain, sprain, arthritis, gout, osteoporosis.

Disclaimer
This app is not a substitute for professional medical or health advice, examination, diagnosis, or treatment. This app disclaims any liability for the decisions you make based on this information.

title: Bladder Diary by iUFlow
description:
iUFlow app is a bladder diary on your mobile. Download to track and monitor toilet trips.
"Bladder diary by iUFlow" is a fully automated voiding and stool diary. 4.8‚≠ê
It is FREE and UNLIMITED Toilet diary üöΩ 
(also known as incontinence tracker üöæ,
pee log ‚úî bladder runpee and stool log üßª).

Urine tracker enables the recording of intake and output (urine). Trace your Bladder activities, as well as recording bowel movement - poo - using a Bristol chart (normal, constipation, diarrhea etc) for a digestive tracker and poo journal. 

Keep track of your bladder and bowel movements easily on your phone, then easily share the diary with your doctor. A complete urine log or a bathroom log is a basic source of data for treatment and will be very appreciated by your health provider. 

Some use iUFlow bladder diary as a comfortable water/urine reminder during the time of completing a 72hr urination bladder diary.
The app further allows the automation of the urine measurement by using the iUFlow device which is an optional item.
 
The iUFlow device is currently for selected clinics and can be pre-ordered.

A detailed BD may be important and useful for health issues related to prostate enlargement, renal failure, kidney transplant, urinary incontinence, Lower Urinary Tract symptoms (LUTS).

recentChanges:
Thanks for using iUFlow. Your support is appreciated!

We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve iUFlow. Here is what's been added to the latest version:
- Removed permission requests
- Better support for night monitoring - incl. option to mark First morning pees and show Nocturia parameters
- poo log + pee log = full toilet tracking

Please let us know what you think!
comments: I was asked to keep a track of my intake of liquids and record when I go to the toilet by a health professional to see what is causing me issues. This app allows you to record when and what you drink and also if you leak and how urgent it is to need to go to the toilet. This app will be good to maintain and monitor that going forward.

This app was able to help me see the potential health problems I was haven that went unnoticed before! After about 2 months of recording, I was able to visit my doctor with documentation when trying to explain my symptoms. Along with a food/exercise tracking app installed around the same time along with good record keeping, my doctor was able to pinpoint my exact cause of symptoms and was able to point me in the right direction for overall better personal health care!!!

Exactly what I needed. Extremely simple. No ridiculous bells and whistles that only a physician would need. My only request would be an easier way to get back from the diary to an entry and reverse. A little old school to have to back out of one to get to the other. Great job. Please keep it simple guys ...too many over complicated over thought apps out there.

Easy to record urine flow and liquid intake. Just enter the volume and your observations. Time of the activity is automatically recorded. Keeps a time wise diary which can be exported by pdf to a mail ID. It will help you and your doctor to monitor any issues. Very easy to use.

Very effective and easy to use. I am not sure I would say I love using it to track all bladder movements, but if you need to do this, this is definitely the no-nonsense, easy-to-use tool to do it. Data export is easy and effective, allowing you the opportunity to throw real data back at your urologist. Oz to ml conversions on the fly, drink size presets, and ability to note characteristics for each entry are features I use. This app owns.

title: Curing IBS - Irritable Bowel Syndrome
description:
In Curing Irritable Bowel Syndrome I concisely and thoroughly discuss everything there is to know about the causes, symptoms and diagnosis of of IBS including -
1. What role stress plays in causing IBS
2. What it means to have a "sensitive colon"
3. How doctors determine how severe the condition is in any individual sufferer
4. Why the condition of Irritable Bowel Syndrome is so difficult to diagnose in the first place!
5. A description of the other medical conditions and afflictions that IBS shares symptoms with and is commonly confused with!
6. A discussion of both the Manning Criteria and the Rome III Criteria which are used by doctors to officially diagnosis a case of IBS
7. Why both loose bowels and constipation are both symptoms of the condition
8. What types of bowel movements to look for in your toilet bowel that may indicate that you have IBS
9. The physical symptoms that many people suffer when they have IBS
10. What anxiety or depression may have to do with IBS
11. How allopathic doctors test for a positive diagnosis of IBS
12. How the use of laxatives can make it difficult to diagnose the condition

And many more issues to do with the diagnosis Irritable Bowel Syndrome.

ARE YOU FRUSTRATED WITH DRUGS THAT DON'T SEEM TO BE A DOING A THING FOR YOUR IBS?

YOU ARE NOT ALONE!

In Curing Irritable Bowel Syndrome I also go through all of the medicines that you might be prescribed by Western Doctors and give you an idea of what to expect including ...
1. A discussion of diphonenoxylate and atropine and how these two drugs interfere with the passage of waste through your system to control diarrhea
2.Why many experts consider diphenoxylate to be a narcotic that gets you high and why it is also considered to be as dangerous and addictive as any street drug
3. The dangerous drug interactions that can occur if you are taking Nardil or Mantulane
4. Why taking Imodium can have a negative impact on the muscle lining of your intestines and make the symptoms of the disorder even worse
5. How some drugs that are commonly prescribed for IBM can stain and damage your teeth and cause problems with the throat and swallowing
6. How the overuse of stool softeners can lead to serious problems such as laxative dependence, dehydration and electrolyte imbalance
7. How the dry mouth caused by drugs used to control cramps (such as dicyclomine) can cause problems with excess sweating and dental decay
8. Why antidepressants are almost always prescribed to people with IBM and the adverse affects of taking them long term

...These are serious side effects. Sometimes when it comes to IBS the cure is worse than the disease!

FRUSTRATION WITH YOUR DOCTOR IS ENOUGH TO BRING ON A BOUT OF IBS SYSTEMS IN ITSELF!!

One of the biggest issues to do with IBS is that there is no single symptom that definitely identifies it as a disease and there is no single "root cause" of the problem that can be attacked and cured.

This means that factors that can trigger symptoms in one individual might have no effect on another.

For instance, I have severe cramps and diarrhea when I eat pineapple but it may not have any type of effect on another sufferer. When it comes to IBS it is all so individual and personalized - the triggers really do vary from person to person.

What I discovered is that the only way to cure this disease is to "know thyself" and then learn how to take care of your body. How well you feel, how much stress you are under and what you eat on any given day is going to play an important part in whether or not you are going to suffer from any symptoms.

Diet plays a very important role in the management of IBS and in Curing Irritable Bowel Syndrome I teach you how to feel better by - 
1. Discussing the role that fiber can take in either improving your condition or making it much worse!
2. How to determine which foods irritate your colon the worst - these are your trigger foods!

AND MANY MORE..

title: home remedies for bedwetting
description:
Before 5 years old, accidental bedwetting is perfectly normal. If it becomes chronic, we talk about enuresis. Herbal medicine, homeopathy, massage or nutrition ... try these 4 natural and effective remedies to remedy it.

 Bedwetting is a very common problem among infants and small children. It is a process of unknowingly passing urine while sleeping. Though frustrating, bedwetting up to six years of age is not unusual.

Children do not have this purpose or out of laziness. It often occurs because of a small bladder, delayed bladder ripening, excessive urine production, urinary tract infection, stress, chronic constipation, or hormone imbalance.

Some children are deep sleepers and their brain does not get the signal that their bladder is full. Also, in a majority of cases, bedwetting is an inherited problem.

Children often get out of bed as they age, but it can be embarrassing and cause your child to shy away from social activities such as slumber parties.

You can help your child stop with some easy and simple natural remedies.

title: Fast Tract Diet
description:
The Fast Tract Diet App helps you identify gut friendly foods versus hard-to-digest foods, track and chart your meals and symptoms, create shopping lists and quickly look up the symptom potential for specific foods & drinks at your favorite market on the fly.

The Fast Tract Diet is based on a flexible ‚ÄúFP‚Äù point system adaptable to a variety of dietary preferences. Each food is assigned a specific point value based on its serving size and symptom potential.

The Lower The FP Points, The Lower The Symptom Potential.

The Fast Tract Diet addresses the symptoms of Functional Gastrointestinal Disorders (FGIDs), Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth (SIBO) and related digestive and general health issues including:
‚Ä¢ Gas, bloating, distension and belching
‚Ä¢ Cramps, abdominal pain and indigestion
‚Ä¢ Diarrhea, constipation or altered bowel habits
‚Ä¢ Heartburn, sore throat, sinus irritation, persistent cough, sour taste, hoarseness, lump in throat feeling and post nasal drip
‚Ä¢ Respiratory symptoms
‚Ä¢ Allergic and autoimmune reactions

FGIDs, SIBO and related digestive and general health issues include, but are not limited to:
‚Ä¢ Acid and non-acid reflux
‚Ä¢ Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
‚Ä¢ Laryngopharyngeal Reflux (LPR)
‚Ä¢ Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
‚Ä¢ Lactose, fructose or other carbohydrate intolerance
‚Ä¢ Celiac disease
‚Ä¢ Crohn‚Äôs disease
‚Ä¢ Diverticulitis
‚Ä¢ Asthma
‚Ä¢ Rosacea
‚Ä¢ Leaky gut and autoimmune diseases

EFFECTIVE
Read the professional reviews and genuine experiences of Fast Tract Dieters (http://digestivehealthinstitute.org/book-reviews/) based on the Fast Tract Digestion books, which describe the diet. The Fast Tract Diet was presented at Digestive Disease Week in 2013 to give gastroenterologists a new dietary alternative for SIBO related conditions.

HOW IT WORKS
It‚Äôs easy. Just follow the 3 steps:
1. Decide your daily FP goal based on the severity of your symptoms.

- For severe symptoms: 25 FP points or less (GREEN)
- For moderate symptoms: 26 ‚Äì 40 FP points (YELLOW)
- For light or no symptoms: 40 FP points and above (RED)

2. Track what you eat and drink including serving sizes and any symptoms you experience.

3. Incorporate the ‚ÄúGut Friendly Practices‚Äù into your daily routine for better digestion.

For more information on FP, FP goal setting and ‚ÄúGut Friendly Practices‚Äù, read the How Fast Tract Diet Works and Gut Friendly Practices chapters by pressing ‚Äù ? ‚Äù on the Dashboard.

DASHBOARD
This is where you start. The graph is automatically generated based on your meals (FP) and symptoms. You can see it either by week or month to track your progress on symptom relief over time.

FP FOOD LIST
Over 800 foods, drinks, condiments and supplements are already pre-calculated to help you meet your ‚ÄúFP‚Äù goal for relief.

TRACKER
Your meals and symptoms are logged here. You can log meals and symptoms from the Dashboard, FP Food List as well as within the Tracker.

MY CUSTOM FOODS
Can‚Äôt find a food in the FP Food List? Enter the nutritional facts and let the App calculate the FP and save it for future use.  You can also create your own recipes. The FP values are automatically calculated per serving making it easy to add to the Tracker.

SHOPPING LIST
Create a low FP shopping list and bring it to your local market! You can also add other household items for convenience.

FP CALCULATOR
This is your mobile food chemist to determine the FP points and symptom potential in any food, drink, etc. Once FP points are calculated, you can add the food to My Custom Foods for future reference.

FAST TRACT DIET
Read about the Fast Tract Diet and Fast Tract Diet App in several concise chapters. Additional resources including books, individual consultation and a community of Fast Tract Dieters on Facebook are also found here.

Credits for various Icons
- https://icons8.com/
- http://www.flaticon.com/
  Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
  Icon made by Picol from www.flaticon.com

summary: The app helps you address digestive symptoms based on the Fast Tract Diet.
recentChanges: Resource notifications for the Fast Tract Diet and digestive as well as over all health issues.
comments: I downloaded this app today and find it VERY useful. I can add all my favorite foods (the ones that aren't already on the app's list) and there is a calculator that allows you to figure out your favorite snacks. I was surprised that most of the "healthy" snack bars I was eating were high FP. There are even suggestions for eating out. I definitely recommend this app.

It's hard to "rate" your symptoms, especially if they don't ever stop. Also if you're not consistent with your rating scheme it's not easy to track if you're actually getting better or what foods are bothering you. I'm at 2wk using the app and I'm feeling better but not 100%. I still belch frequently and have a low level of heart burn all the time and I don't go over ~20 points a day.

I tried this diet on a whim, as a last ditch effort to avoid taking prilosec. I had been suffering from painful reflux for over two months. My ENT said the acid was reaching my voice box, which was why my voice was hoarse. I couldn't barely read my kids a book üò≠ I kept thinking "but I eat healthy! why is this happening to me?" It turns out I was eating too many carbs and way too much fiber. I've been on the diet for 10 weeks now and I no longer need meds! I highly recommend the FTD.

Very much enjoy using this app, along with the book that I imported from Amazon in the US. There are manual ways to calculate the FP points but we are finding that we have to do that more and more as there isn't as much variety in the foods and drinks that we would like.  I suppose living in the UK there are going to be some issues like that, some foods seem to be American orientated.  Then there are some oddities like prepared porridge oats, prepared with what - water or whole milk or skimmed milk etc..?   Good app overall and compliments the book well, for an understanding as to why FP points could be important to your digestive health.  I wonder if this app is due for an update anytime, and if so what might be included....?

I like the app even though there are still foods missing like couscous, napa cabbage, and probably much more, it has a feature to add custom foods but the app doesn't accept decimal points (like 1.5g), and it's almost impossible to find the sugar alcohol content of many foods. It's an excellent start and I hope Norm doesn't give up on this app which has tremendous potential to achieve mainstream status.

title: Zemedy - IBS, Gut Relief (CBT, Poop,Tracker, Diet)
description:
With a fresh new look and a string of new features, a newly-updated Zemedy is here!

Zemedy is a digital care programme built to empower individuals with irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) to self-manage their condition. With a little help from a virtual chatbot, Mel, Zemedy guides you through your personalised care journey and helps you change the way you address IBS-related symptoms using clinically-proven insights and analytics. Zemedy‚Äôs integrated approach keeps time-consuming doctor visits and therapy costs to a minimum.

Developed alongside clinical experts, Zemedy integrates evidence-based, highly effective psychological therapies for IBS, including cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and gut-directed hypnotherapy. Zemedy also leverages the latest medical research that‚Äôs packed with know-how from our science team in gastroenterology, nutrition, psychology, and neuroscience.

Still, Zemedy isn't a replacement for professional medical help - you should check in with a doctor in addition to using the programme on the journey to improved digestive health.

7+ New Zemedy Features:
- An updated, interactive interface - with a brand-new virtual IBS coach and a fresh library of educational and engaging content.
- Our core CBT programme has been cut down to 6 modules (the shorter, the better, right?!)
- A spruced-up Tools section, with brand new exercises to try
- A 7-Day Plan section to help you schedule your tasks ahead and remind you to find your zen
- Flare Mode: a trusty tool to get fast relief for sudden symptoms
- Daily logs to help you keep track of your mood and symptoms and identify specific patterns within your mind and body
- Insights dashboard that keeps track of your health journey and lets you watch your symptoms, activity, and progress
- More resources with quick tips and tricks, alongside the core programme
- Our new virtual IBS coach, Mel, will keep you motivated, educated, and on-track with your modules, tasks, and health checks.

What you can expect from Zemedy:

Symptom relief and a restored bowel harmony;
- Improved emotional health and wellbeing, starting with symptom-related anxieties;
- Understanding of the gut-brain interaction in IBS;
- Integrated and personalised approach to your IBS;
- A safe and secure space within an IBS community;
- New and improved standards for your health-related quality of life.

If you have any questions, or would like to share some feedback, we would love to hear from you!
hello@zemedy.com
@tryzemedy

**MORE ON SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS**

Zemedy offers three auto-renewing subscription options:

¬£18.99 per month
¬£49.99 per 3 months
¬£149.99 per year


A monthly subscription to Zemedy costs ¬£18.99 a month. Alternatively, you can choose our great value Quarterly or yearly plan for only ¬£49.99 and ¬£149.99 respectively.

If you select the annual option, you‚Äôll be billed for ‚ÄòZemedy - Subscription‚Äò each year, and have unlimited access to Zemedy for 1 calendar year.
If you select the Quarterly option, you‚Äôll be billed for ‚ÄòZemedy - Quarterly Subscription‚Äô every three months, and have unlimited access to Zemedy during the 3 months of purchase.
If you select the monthly option, you‚Äôll be billed for ‚ÄòZemedy - Monthly Subscription‚Äô every month, and have unlimited access to Zemedy during the month of purchase.


Your subscription payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase.
Your subscription will renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before your payment period ends. On renewal, payment will be taken 24 hours before the end of each payment period.

You can manage your subscription and can turn off auto-renewal at any time in your Account Settings.

Use up that free trial! If you don‚Äôt, you won‚Äôt be able to get those free 7 days of gut care back (it will be forfeited the next time you buy a subscription).

Privacy policy - https://www.zemedy.com/privacy/
Terms and conditions - https://www.zemedy.com/terms/

title: Porphyria Disease
description: Porphyria is a group of diseases in which substances called porphyrins build up, negatively affecting the skin or nervous system. The types that affect the nervous system are also known as acute porphyria, as symptoms are rapid in onset and last a short time. Symptoms of an attack include abdominal pain, chest pain, vomiting, confusion, constipation, fever, high blood pressure, and high heart rate. The attacks usually last for days to weeks. Complications may include paralysis, low blood sodium levels, and seizures. Attacks may be triggered by alcohol, smoking, hormonal changes, fasting, stress, or certain medications. If the skin is affected, blisters or itching may occur with sunlight exposure. Most types of porphyria are inherited from a person's parents and are due to a mutation in one of the genes that make heme. They may be inherited in an autosomal dominant, autosomal recessive, or X-linked dominant manner. One type, porphyria cutanea tarda, may also be due to increased iron in the liver, hepatitis C, alcohol, or HIV/AIDS. The underlying mechanism results in a decrease in the amount of heme produced and a build-up of substances involved in making heme. Porphyrias may also be classified by whether the liver or the bone marrow is affected. Diagnosis is typically by blood, urine, and stool tests. Genetic testing may be done to determine the specific mutation.

title: Irritable Bowel Syndrome - IBS
description:
Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) is a common disorder that affects the large intestine. Signs and symptoms include cramping, abdominal pain, bloating, gas, and diarrhea or constipation, or both. IBS is a chronic condition that you'll need to manage long term.
Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) affects between 6‚Äì18% of people worldwide.
This condition involves changes in frequency or form of bowel movements and lower abdominal pain.
Diet, stress, poor sleep and changes in gut bacteria may all trigger symptoms.

title: Appendix Diet Foods Help Tips
description:
Appendix Diet Foods Help Tips app is a free app contains information about appendicitis causes symptoms treatment and diet tips & help. Appendicitis is inflammation of the appendix and could be acute or chronic. If left untreated, appendicitis may cause your appendix to burst and cause infection. This can be serious and sometimes fatal. If you have appendicitis, you may experience one or more of the following symptoms:
* Lower right side abdominal pain
* Pain around the belly button
* Loss of appetite
* Nausea
* Vomiting
* Diarrhea
* Constipation
* Inability to pass gas
‚Ä¢abdominal swelling
‚Ä¢low-grade fever
‚Ä¢a sense that you might feel better after passing stool

Appendicitis pain may start off as mild cramping. It often becomes more steady and severe over time. You may also feel a general pain become more targeted.
an obstruction in the appendix may cause appendicitis. Obstruction may be either partial or complete. Complete obstruction is a cause for emergency surgery.

Obstruction is often due to an accumulation of fecal matter. It can also be the result of:
‚Ä¢enlarged lymphoid follicles
‚Ä¢worms
‚Ä¢trauma
‚Ä¢tumors

When there‚Äôs an obstruction in your appendix, bacteria can multiply inside the organ. This leads to the formation of pus.
One of the problems of appendicitis is that it can affect a person‚Äôs bowel movement adversely. While a few people may get diarrhea as a result of appendicitis, it is a lot more common for people to suffer from constipation. Including fiber rich foods and drinking enough water may help you in easy bowel movements. Person should avoid greasy and spicy , refined, high sweetened and salty foods.
Diet modifications and lifestyle changes may help you in fast recovery.

title: Hemorrhoids Piles Help Prevention Foods Diet Tips
description:
Hemorrhoids or Piles Diet Tips is a free app containing information about piles or hemorrhoids and it's symptoms causes treatment diet & food tips. Hemorrhoids are also called piles and are very common. Hemorrhoids cause pain, severe itching, and difficulty sitting

There are two types of hemorrhoids 
* internal hemorrhoids:- These lie inside the rectum.
* external hemorrhoids:- These are under the skin around your anus. When irritated, external hemorrhoids can itch or bleed.

Causes of hemorrhoids could be:-
‚Ä¢straining during a bowel movement
‚Ä¢complications from chronic constipation
‚Ä¢sitting for a long period of time, especially on the toilet
‚Ä¢a family history of hemorrhoids

Signs and symptoms of hemorrhoids may include:
‚Ä¢Painless bleeding during bowel movements ‚Äî you might notice small amounts of bright red blood on your toilet tissue or in the toilet
‚Ä¢Itching or irritation in your anal region
‚Ä¢Pain or discomfort
‚Ä¢Swelling around your anus
‚Ä¢A lump near your anus, which may be sensitive or painful (may be a thrombosed hemorrhoid)

Hemorrhoid symptoms usually depend on the location. Bleeding during bowel movements is the most common sign of hemorrhoids.
Eating a healthy diet including more of dietary fiber and healthy liquids, drinking more water may help you provide relief from hemorrhoids
Consistent heavy lifting, being obese, or having other constant strain on your body can increase your risk of developing hemorrhoids.

title: Bristol Stool Chart
description:
The Bristol Stool Chart app allows you to monitor your stool quality and record the information on your device. Your stool quality over time is displayed as a simple graph which can be shared with your health professional. It also presents you with information about each type of stool along with links to more information online. title: Herbal Home Remedies and Natural Cures
description:
Home remedies have been part of our lives since ancient times and
today there is a great movement towards using them as cures and
treatments for all kinds of diseases.
They involve the use of natural elements such as common herbs,
fruits, vegetables and other resources that are available to us. Moreover,
they are used because they hold special medicinal properties that can help
treat all kind of conditions. The main lure of these remedies is that they do
not contain harmful chemicals and do not produce worrying side effects,
both of which are often associated with modern day medical treatments
and medicines.

This app contains information on how to treat common illness and ailments at home by using easy to find herbs and natural ingredients. It also provides information on different water treatment methods. It also contains a huge dictionary of medicinal plans from where users can easily learn how to use different herbs to treat various deceases.

comments: Alternative Cures is the answer to most heath related problems you will every come across. I have been using this app for over a year now and will go to it for almost anything from an ear ache to muscle cramps, infections, stomach aches, the flu, head colds, you name it and this book with have the natural cure for it.

Careful, reviews here were bought. Check other apps of phytotherapy and you'll find the exact same words. That aside, I still don't suggest this app, nor for beginners or professionals. For beginners there're way too many technical terms just to fill in the page. For professionals we know there'rre A LOT of danger with what they're mentioning regarding the method on how to use the plant. Cut the leaf and ingest it? What part of the leaf? How many? Unless you know what you're doing, don't risk it

I have had this app several months now, I check with this app whenever some new illness or health issue arises. This app should be in every phone because doctors won't tell you " fix yourself " , with common products found in many homes , to solve your problem . After all they are in the pill prescription business

Having studied herbalism and alternative medicine for decades I expected something more from this app. The list of herbs, while lengthy, omits a number of extremely important and useful herbs while including some that I have never heard of. Some of the recommendations are more like old folk cures and again, omit proven useful herbal remedies. I would not rely on this app for anything.

I gave it 5 starts because it really is a rather comprehensive beginning herbal app. If you know nothing you will come away knowing enough to get you started. It also very well organized, which definitely supports learning. If you know most of this it is a great reference for common ailments and herbs.

title: Pain Diary - Pain Management Log
description:
This log can help you track the everyday things that have an impact on your pain. When you understand what makes your pain worse, you can begin to work on ways to reduce or deal with your pain ‚Äútriggers.‚Äù

The more you know about how your body reacts, the more you can be in control. And being in better control can help you be less afraid and better able to manage your pain. 

This app makes it easy to track your pain & symptoms and report to your doctors. Use our pain diary to keep track of your pain over time and share it with your doctor at your next appointment. Track a variety of pain elements, including location, pain duration, triggers and more.

A pain diary is used to monitor levels of pain over a long period of time and collect data on possible triggers for that pain. One solution pain doctors recommend is keeping a pain diary, a consistent record of your pain experience.

Your doctor will be looking for triggers, stresses, and patterns. The more detailed you can be about the factors that seem to influence your pain, the better. An accurate record of your pain will help your doctor give you the best treatment.

Why a Pain Journal Works for Chronic Pain
This information is useful both for you and your doctor. It can be used to help identify patterns of pain, such as time of day or level of stress, or pain triggers from certain activities. A pain journal can also show what doesn‚Äôt increase your pain, which can help you make better decisions about how you spend your day. 

What exactly do you log in a pain journal? Everybody uses their journal differently, but in this app you can do the following:
- Give your pain a scale rating. We use the pain scale with the 0-10 rating system, with 0 representing no pain and 10 representing the worst imaginable pain. Your pain will usually fall somewhere in between.
- Use pain descriptor words. Using pain descriptor words in your journal can help you track changes and patterns in your pain quality. It can also help doctors pinpoint your type of pain.
- Track the time of day pain occurs. 
- Note what you are doing when your pain begins. 
- Look at elements that might contribute to your pain.
- Write down what you ate and drank that day.
- Describe your mood

title: chemoWave: cancer health app
description:
ALL NEW: chemoWave Pro

Subscribe to chemoWave Pro and get a weekly summary of your data with insights and trends to help you take control and get better care. (30 Day Free Trial, $4.99 / month, or $24 / 6 months)

Discover what‚Äôs impacting your ups and downs, see engaging charts with things like moods, symptoms, medications, activities, and sleep -- and share ongoing My Reports with your doctors to avoid side effects and improve your care.

---

chemoWave is a mobile application that helps cancer patients track their symptoms, medications, and activities. The app empowers people with cancer by providing insights that enable them to work more effectively with their support team and better control the side effects and symptoms they experience during cancer treatment and chemotherapy.

Cancer patients don‚Äôt have to feel overwhelmed by chemotherapy any longer; because today, much can be done to control what they experience while undergoing cancer treatment. Many treatment side effects experienced during cancer (like nausea, constipation, fatigue, hair loss, loss of appetite, dehydration, depression, etc.) can be significantly reduced, if not eliminated altogether. 

chemoWave is a virtual advocate for cancer patients, a companion helping them to do everything in their power to feel better.  

chemoWave empowers patients to:

- TRACK:  chemoWave makes it easy for you to keep record of your physical and emotional wellbeing during cancer treatment

- DISCOVER: Personal insights help you identify how your actions are related to your condition and symptoms experienced during cancer

- SHARE: A reliable account of your cancer treatment experience leads to better collaboration with care providers

chemoWave FEATURES:

- Update Your Overall Condition and mood.
 - Log your activities, sleep, water intake, steps, meal, vitals, weight, temperature, appointments. Keep track of your logged entries in the calendar and home page.
 - Track your Symptoms using the 5-point severity scale and list of 84 symptoms. Add your custom new symptoms.
 - Schedule medications reminders, get reminded to take your medication with a push notification.
 - Save your care providers, care taker contacts information and keep track of everyday wellbeing through the journal.

More FEATURES:

 - Charts & Personal Analytics: chemoWave provides a comprehensive & unified understanding of a patient and his/her treatment experience enabling the identification of how his or her individual actions and encounters are related to significant shifts in their overall wellbeing or symptoms.
 - Interactive ‚ÄúSmart‚Äù Charts, Automatically updated and personalized to your cancer journey
 - Share Feature: Users are able to share their unique cancer treatment experiences with family, friends, or doctors.

 - Correlation Insights: Personal Insights (based on a patient‚Äôs own health data), and Global Insights (comparing how the patient aligns with other chemoWave users with a similar profile.)  The Personal Insights report specifically identifies and highlights how each user‚Äôs individual behaviors, activities and experiences are related to their symptom occurrences, moods and feeling better or worse. Simultaneously, Global Insights report delivers comparison data with other chemoWave users who have a similar profiles and diagnoses

- Save your care providers, care taker contacts information and keep track of everyday wellbeing through the journal.

More FEATURES:

- Charts & Personal Analytics: chemoWave provides a comprehensive & unified understanding of a patient and his/her treatment experience enabling the identification of how his or her individual actions and encounters are related to significant shifts in their overall wellbeing or symptoms.
- Interactive ‚ÄúSmart‚Äù Charts, Automatically updated and personalized to your cancer journey
- Share Feature: Users are able to share their unique cancer treatment experiences with family, friends, or doctors.

- Correlation Insights: Personal Insights (based on a patient‚Äôs own health data), and Global Insights (comparing how the patient aligns with other chemoWave users with a similar profile.) The Personal Insights report specifically identifies and highlights how each user‚Äôs individual behaviors, activities and experiences are related to their symptom occurrences, moods and feeling better or worse. Simultaneously, Global Insights report delivers comparison data with other chemoWave users who have a similar profiles and diagnoses
summary: track your symptoms & activities, discover how to propel yourself through cancer

comments: Intuitive and very easy to use. I find in app notes feature useful for many reasons. The only thing that I wish is it also supports Samsung gear and so on. I hope the developer has eye on this as well.
Excellent app and easy to use.
Half the app does not work.

The app looks extremely useful, but here are points that need fixing: profile pics are by default displayed at a 90¬∞ rotation. Body temperature has three digits in Celcius but should only have two. (Sent to the extremely nice and helpful support, thank you for your answer!)

Looks super useful but can't input temozolomide's 5days on 23days off cycle. Probably better support for other cancers, but that's a deal breaker for brain cancer. Also, probably should differentiate between cancer symptoms and medication side effects. There is no way to input side effects in the past. When I am feeling sick, the last thing I want to do is mess with the phone. For heavy reactions, input is going to be retroactive, so good to support that I think.

title: Diarrhea Home & Natural Remedies
description:
What is Diarrhea?

Diarrhea can be a very unpleasant feeling. It involves several uncontrollable bowel movements in a day that include loose stool passage, usually with no bulk in it. But a bout of diarrhea can be very beneficial to rid your body of unpleasant substances. The process can be likened to vomiting, which is very useful for the body flush out harmful toxins. But the entire procedure is so discomforting and painful that you need to find a cure for it as soon as you possibly can.

Etiology of Diarrhea
Diarrhea can be caused by a viral or bacterial infection that might enter your body when you consume contaminated water or food. It may also be caused by excessive drinking, a food allergy, anxiety, and stress, or medicinal side effects. Excess fluids passing through your large intestine, more than it can absorb, can also cause diarrhea. When parasites, bacteria, or viruses enter your bloodstream via food and water, they damage the digestive lining, thereby making it difficult for the colon to absorb fluids optimally.

Symptoms of Diarrhea

Prominent symptoms of diarrhea include watery, loose stools. Other symptoms that usually accompany diarrhea include vomit, frequent bowel movements, stomach ache, and fever, dehydration, loss of appetite, and nausea.

Types of Diarrhea

Diarrhea can either be chronic or acute depending on the duration it lasts. If your condition exceeds two to three weeks, it can be chronic. Otherwise, the status is acute.

Avoid over the counter medications and try some simple home remedies that can be very helpful in both acute and chronic diarrhea.

title: Gi BodyGuard from the CDHF
description:
The more health information you provide to your physician, the better care you will receive. Gi BodyGuard, developed by experts at the Canadian Digestive Health Foundation (www.CDHF.ca), is a free, easy to use app that allows you to track information about your health, symptoms, medications, food and exercise.  


Who uses Gi BodyGuard?

Gi BodyGuard caters to people with a multitude of digestive health issues including IBS, IBD (Crohns and Ulcerative Colitis), Celiac Disease, Lactose Intolerance, GERD, Acid Reflux, Diarrhea and Constipation, among others. 


What can Gi BodyGuard do for me?

Gi BodyGuard empowers you to track vital health information. With a few quick clicks, you can quickly, easily and privately create an extensive, up-to-the-minute summary of your digestive health history to share with your health care team. Armed with critical information about you, they can recognize trends that may indicate a change in your health status, make the best diagnosis, and provide informed care to help you feel better.


Use Gi BodyGuard to track:

‚Ä¢ Stool frequency and consistency
‚Ä¢ Presence and type of blood in stool
‚Ä¢ Symptoms you experience
‚Ä¢ Pain location and severity
‚Ä¢ Medications 
‚Ä¢ Your medical history
‚Ä¢ Food and liquids intake
‚Ä¢ Exercise (cardio, strength training and stretching)
‚Ä¢ Weight

Gi BodyGuard also allows you to set reminders for taking medications and renewing your prescriptions. Whether you are dealing with a short term or chronic illness, these are important for regaining and maintaining your good health.


ABOUT THE CDHF

The Canadian Digestive Health Foundation (CDHF) helps reduce suffering and improve quality of life by empowering people like you with trusted, up to date, science-based information about digestive health and disease. As the Foundation of the Canadian Association of Gastroenterology, we work directly with leading physicians, scientists, and other health care professionals to help you understand and take control of your digestive health with confidence and optimism. In addition to developing Gi BodyGuard, the foundation offers a robust suite of educational information, programs and events to those looking to improve their digestive -- and overall -- health. You can learn more at www.CDHF.ca.

recentChanges:

comments: I tried putting in my weight, and while it shows "kg" as the measurement, when you look at the log, it shows "lb". Can you please fix this...and maybe add the option of switching to lb or kg, depending on preference. AND you cant remove it if you make a mistake!  And...when you try to send comments directly to them...the email address is invalid!!  I'm losing faith in this app... Please fix...Thanks.

App has lots of potential, but lots of problems. It's easy to log food, meds, stools, symptoms. However, the food database is very small and while it's easy to add foods I was adding multiple foods per day, every day. The med list is more complete but isn't searchable, and has spelling errors (falgyl). Worst, there's no way to go back and edit logs, or delete if you make a mistake. Also was really hoping the app would correlate symptoms to foods... It doesn't.

I was really excited to learn that the CDHF created an app to log activity related to digestive disorder for Canadians.   However; my excitement soon turned to frustration in using this app.  There's no edit button,  once you log your entries it is written in stone.  You can't go back and make any changes.   Furthermore; on logging your meals, if you don't choose an item from the predetermined list and just make an entry via the 'Add Notes' , and attempt to log, the app will crash.

Useful as but the inability to make any changes or delete incorrect entries makes it frustrating to use.  Also the previous meals options are buggy - often what I select isn't what shows on the screen.
This app is great. Tracks a ton of information I can share with my doctor. Quick.  Easy. Love the reports and notes features.

title: How To Cure Hemmorhoids
description:
Hemorrhoids (HEM-uh-roids), also called piles, are swollen veins in your anus and lower rectum, similar to varicose veins. Hemorrhoids have a number of causes, although often the cause is unknown. They may result from straining during bowel movements or from the increased pressure on these veins during pregnancy. Hemorrhoids may be located inside the rectum (internal hemorrhoids), or they may develop under the skin around the anus (external hemorrhoids).

title: Poop Map
description:
Poop Map is a small app that helps you log all the places you've pooped. 

By pressing the only real button available, "Drop the poop", you'll mark you location and be able to conquest your home, office, friends' houses. Expand everywhere and show your friends "all these places I've pooped"!

It also enables you to share your poop locations privately with your friends using the app or via official website.

Also available on iOS now so you can share your poops with your Apple friends.

Have you ever dreamed about getting push notifications when your friend drops a new poop or you get a new follower? the day is here!

Features:
- View and share your poops with the world (update your privacy mode in Profile -> Settings)
- View people you follow or who follow you by tapping on followers/following count on profile
- Share your poops via Poop Map Web with Profile -> Share action
- Configure push notification settings in Profile -> Settings
- Like your friend's poops in the feed
- Poop statistics in Profile

comments: The GPS can be a little wonky. A menu of adjectives could go a long way to tracking poop quality rather than just stars (but those are great). I'd like to know what other badges exist. It would be cool to be able to find friends without knowing their username, although I understand that most would probably prefer no mention of this app appear on their social media.

Fun app, but definitely needs an update. Too many things just don't make sense. The poop drops before you have put in info so if you accidentally need to edit, you have to drop another then go back to delete. The feed doesn't update enough and hard to find follow requests. Camera feature needs more options as well. I could see the app really taking off if someone would just pay better attention to it, make it easier to do things, and give a makeover.

I LOVE this app. I've convinced so many of my friends to join, and we're having the time of our lives. I would give five stars, but I have to take one off for how glitchy it is. I often have problems with the poop drop button, and it's just sort of laggy and weird in general. My other suggestion is that we should be able to see all the achievements we can accomplish so I know what to go after. And also, that our friends need to have different coloured pegs for each different account.

This app is the most amazing concept ever, absolutely phenomenal. My only suggestion is you being able to label certain places so you can drop multiple poops in the same place or on the same pin. Right now, you can only drop pins on top of each other so it makes it appear like someone has pooped way more places than you when in reality they're logging everytime they poop in the same place. This really skews the statistics for leagues and such

I love this but I wish you could add photos from your camera roll & if leagues had a discription next to it. Also if one day there was different reaction symbols, like fb, to react to poops with that'd be really cool. I like it though ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Idle Poo Factory
description:
The controversial Masterpiece certified by the World Poo Association!
Even just looking at it cures constipation!

#Prologue
In a future not so far from now, humanity's craving for fine art has gone bananas...

To the point where artificial human excrement made from faux human digestive tract started being sold as art.
Indeed, the Great Age of Poo has begun.

And here you are, challenging this artwork market with your masterpiece, Poopy Man Mark I.
Towards the Greatest Pooper of the World!

#CHARACTERISTICS
1. Unique Graphics - Crafted from hand-made pixel art.
2. The Peak of all Idle Games - Taste the very summit of an idle game.
3. Variety of Ingredients - Has all the fun of unlocking around 100 different ingredients.
4. PooNet - Cumulative poo weight is sent to the PooNet, and you can see the World Ranking.
5. Certificate - Certificates are issued from the World Poo Association.

#How To Play
1. The ingredients are automatically fed.
2. Poo is produced through the mouth, toothed wheel, and aging container. (Touch to speed up the process.)
3. Produced poo is sold according to the current price. (You can increase the price in the Price tab.)
4. You can withdraw the revenue from the bank to unlock heavier ingredients or upgrade each part.
5. Produce a lot of poo to become the Top Ranker in PooNet.

# Precautions before deleting the game
Please note that when the game is deleted from the device, saved data is also deleted. Please utilize the cloud save load feature in the setup menu when changing your device.
Payment details can be restored for non-consumptive products (add removal etc) but not for consumptive products (coins). Please use the " Restore" function in the settings menu.

# Why does it ask for access to a photo album?
It is to ask for permission to save the capture screen. It is not used for any other purpose.

#Info
Part of the revenue is donated to Toilet Construction Project in underdeveloped countries via International Toilet Society (http://www.withwta.org).

descriptionHTML:
The controversial Masterpiece certified by the World Poo Association!
Even just looking at it cures constipation!

#Prologue
In a future not so far from now, humanity's craving for fine art has gone bananas...

To the point where artificial human excrement made from faux human digestive tract started being sold as art.
Indeed, the Great Age of Poo has begun.

And here you are, challenging this artwork market with your masterpiece, Poopy Man Mark I.
Towards the Greatest Pooper of the World!

#CHARACTERISTICS
1. Unique Graphics - Crafted from hand-made pixel art.
2. The Peak of all Idle Games - Taste the very summit of an idle game.
3. Variety of Ingredients - Has all the fun of unlocking around 100 different ingredients.
4. PooNet - Cumulative poo weight is sent to the PooNet, and you can see the World Ranking.
5. Certificate - Certificates are issued from the World Poo Association.

#How To Play
1. The ingredients are automatically fed.
2. Poo is produced through the mouth, toothed wheel, and aging container. (Touch to speed up the process.)
3. Produced poo is sold according to the current price. (You can increase the price in the Price tab.)
4. You can withdraw the revenue from the bank to unlock heavier ingredients or upgrade each part.
5. Produce a lot of poo to become the Top Ranker in PooNet.

# Precautions before deleting the game
Please note that when the game is deleted from the device, saved data is also deleted. Please utilize the cloud save load feature in the setup menu when changing your device.
Payment details can be restored for non-consumptive products (add removal etc) but not for consumptive products (coins). Please use the " Restore" function in the settings menu.

# Why does it ask for access to a photo album?
It is to ask for permission to save the capture screen. It is not used for any other purpose.

#Info
Part of the revenue is donated to Toilet Construction Project in underdeveloped countries via International Toilet Society (http://www.withwta.org).

title: Wave: Your Health Tracker
description:
ALL NEW: Wave Pro

Subscribe to Wave Pro and get a weekly summary of your data with insights and trends to help you take control and get better care. (30 Day Free Trial, $4.99 / month, or $24 / 6 months)


Discover what‚Äôs impacting your ups and downs, see engaging charts with things like moods, symptoms, medications, activities, and sleep -- and share ongoing My Reports with your doctors to avoid side effects and improve your care.

--

Wave is a free health app for chronic illness patients to track symptoms, medications, sleep, steps, and other important activities. Wave provides you with personal insights that enable you to work more effectively with doctors or care team to better control the side effects and symptoms you experience with conditions like chronic pain, diabetes, depression, or cancer.

People fighting chronic conditions don‚Äôt have to feel overwhelmed any longer; much can be done to control what you might experience while undergoing treatment. Many side effects (like nausea, constipation, fatigue, etc.) can be significantly reduced, if not eliminated altogether while fighting chronic illness.

Wave is a virtual advocate for your health, a companion helping you to do everything in your power to feel better.

Wave empowers those with health conditions to:

- TRACK SYMPTOMS & CONDITION:

Wave makes it easy for you to keep record of your physical and emotional wellbeing, tracking things like symptoms, mood, medications, water intake, sleep, and steps (integrated with Google Fit)


- DISCOVER INSIGHTS:

Real-time, personal insights help you identify how your actions are related to your condition and symptoms, so you can take control of your health while facing chronic illness.

- SHARE YOUR HEALTH UPDATES:

A reliable account of your treatment experience leads to better collaboration with your care team or family.

Wave App FEATURES:

- Update Your Overall Condition:

A simple ‚Äúswipe‚Äù is all it takes indicate shifts in how you're feeling. Users can be specific about their ‚Äúups‚Äù and ‚Äúdowns‚Äù using 0% to 100% scale.

- Track Your Symptoms & Mood:

Symptom changes are easy to keep track of using a 5-point ‚ÄúSeverity‚Äù scale, and a list of common symptoms (auto-ordered by severity). ‚ÄúNew‚Äù symptoms can also be added as you go.

- See Personalized Insights:

Our AI-enabled personal "My Insights" are generated based on your own experiences. You'll discover what's related to your ups and downs and what you can do to take control of your health during chronic illness.

- Log Activities like Medication, Steps, Sleep:

Update your activities (Automatically integrated with Google Fit)

- Use a Quick Log to easily track every health experience along your journey:

Quickly log the times and details of important activities during treatment, like yoga, walking, water intake, or meals.

** Users can easily chronicle the time and duration of what they do and what they experience and add notes, images and other details like "how the activity or experience affected their mood".

- Charts & Personal Analytics: Wave provides a comprehensive & unified understanding of a patient and his/her treatment experience enabling the identification of how his or her individual actions and encounters are related to significant shifts in their overall wellbeing or symptoms.

* Interactive Charts, automatically updated and personalized to your journey

- Share Feature: Users are able to share their unique health experiences with family, friends, or doctors.

** Wave does not give medical advice, please consult with your doctor before making any necessary changes to your health plan **

comments: I had uninstalled the app because I was unable to change the time. I received an email from the Wave health team, so I reinstalled it. All that I was told to do, doesn't work at all. title: MindReset - Clear your stress in moments!
description:
Clear your mind from anxiety and stress, leaving you free to enjoy a healthier life!

The app was developed based on 20 years of tried and tested behavioural change work in private practice helping many people with a unique method. Interrupting the connection between your negative emotional memories and your brain, clearing your mind and leaving you feeling much better. 

Using advanced eye tracking technology, this unique method is now brought right to your mobile device.

Your brain is being triggered by emotional memories hidden inside your mind, that‚Äôs why your problem has been so difficult to diagnose, because it‚Äòs real, you haven‚Äôt made it up. Your mind holds the key to why you have too much or too little cortisol or adrenaline leading to massive social anxiety, panic attacks, stress and burnout and even chronic pain, but they are all symptoms of past emotional experiences. 

You may have the time on your hands to master meditation, mindfulness or another healing therapy, which is great. The benefits of meditation are now scientifically proven to be beneficial to your body and mind. You could spend hours practicing DIY meditation at home or simply allow MindReset to accelerate the process for you in minutes.

Fear driven problems associated with anxiety and stress are listed below:

Hyperarousal¬†
‚Ä¢	angry outbursts
‚Ä¢	irritability
‚Ä¢	sleeping problems (insomnia)
‚Ä¢	difficulty concentrating
‚Ä¢	Tired yet wired
‚Ä¢	Adrenal Fatigue
‚Ä¢	other mental health problems ‚Äì such as depression, anxiety or¬†phobias, 
‚Ä¢	Self-harming or destructive behaviour¬†‚Äì such as drug or alcohol misuse 
‚Ä¢	other physical symptoms ‚Äì such as¬†headaches, dizziness,¬†chest and other pains and¬†stomach-ache 
‚Ä¢	PTSD, Trauma, Emotional Memory Images, sometimes leads to work-related problems and the breakdown of relationships.
‚Ä¢	M.E. ratio 3 women to 1 man
‚Ä¢	Abdominal pain, cramping or Irritable Bowel Syndrome IBS
‚Ä¢	A bloated feeling
‚Ä¢	Gas
‚Ä¢	Diarrhoea or constipation ‚Äî sometimes alternating bouts of constipation and diarrhoea
‚Ä¢	Level of depression

Hyporarousal

‚Ä¢	You feel distant and disconnected from your body
‚Ä¢	¬†Emotional¬†and or Physical Numbness
‚Ä¢	Blank¬†Mind
‚Ä¢	Profound¬†detachment can‚Äôt get into or hold onto a relationship or job
‚Ä¢	¬†Inability¬†to move or respond
‚Ä¢	Extreme¬†drowsiness and even temporary loss of consciousness

Your fear response is the cause of your problems. By interrupting your thoughts, we can clear cached Emotional Memory Images that have been running for years. This ‚Äòchemical imbalance‚Äô is really a neurochemical overload, to an emotional stimulus, draining your body of the vital energy you need to begin your own healing process.

Now the app is here to help, it's fun, quick and simple with a positive long term effect.
